import React from "react"; function TermsConditions() { return (

Terms and Conditions

Terms and Conditions for ProjectTrek
Effective date: 14.04.2023

Welcome to ProjectTrek, a web application that allows you to manage your projects and collaborate with your team. By using our web application, you agree to the following Terms & Conditions:

Acceptance of Terms & Conditions

These Terms & Conditions govern your use of our web application. By using our application, you agree to these Terms & Conditions. If you do not agree to these Terms & Conditions, you may not use our web application.

Use of Web Application

You may use our web application for your personal or business purposes, subject to these Terms & Conditions. You may not use our application for any illegal or unauthorized purpose, or in any way that violates these Terms & Conditions.

Registration and Account Security

To use our web application, you must register and create an account. You are responsible for maintaining the security of your account and password. You are also responsible for any activities that occur under your account. If you suspect unauthorized use of your account, you must notify us immediately.

Intellectual Property

Our web application and its contents, including text, graphics, logos, and software, are the property of ProjectTrek and its licensors. You may not use our web application or its contents for any commercial purpose without our express written permission.

Termination

We may terminate or suspend your access to the Service immediately, without prior notice or liability, for any reason whatsoever, including without limitation if you breach the Terms.

Governing Law

These Terms shall be governed and construed in accordance with the laws of [INSERT YOUR COUNTRY]. Any dispute arising under or relating in any way to these Terms shall be resolved exclusively by the competent courts of [INSERT YOUR CITY/STATE].

Changes to Terms and Conditions

We reserve the right, at our sole discretion, to modify or replace these Terms at any time. If a revision is material, we will provide at least 30 days' notice prior to any new terms taking effect. What constitutes a material change will be determined at our sole discretion.

Contact Us

If you have any questions or concerns about these Terms and Conditions or our practices regarding personal information, please contact us at [INSERT CONTACT INFORMATION].

) } export default TermsConditions;
